column5: Comfortable private room located between Downtown, Uptown and Baylor. Room has comfortable queen bed and TV. I provide toiletry items, iron, full kitchen access, and washer/dryer use. Great for business travelers or those visiting Dallas. Long term booking available. Lots of shopping, restaurants and public transportation within walking distance. City Place station is the closest DART station (two blocks away).
column8: Close to Baylor, Uptown, Downtown and DART R2
